definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: Went to IB-CAS, decided to take the phd exam and try to follow a academician.
sentences.chinese: 去了一次北京植物所，定下来报考一位院士的博士。

sentences.english: Cultivating academicians mainly depends on the most famous university, scientific research institution and the great masters.
sentences.chinese: 培养院士主要靠最著名的大学和科研机构，靠大师。

sentences.english: Academician Shang Yongfeng is a famous biochemist and molecular biologist.
sentences.chinese: 尚永丰院士是我国著名生物化学与分子生物学家。

sentences.english: This paper is dedicated to academician Sheng Jinzhang, a famous paleontologist.
sentences.chinese: 专此纪念著名的古生物学家盛金章院士。

sentences.english: Not very far, the National Academy members I’m sure would have you believe.
sentences.chinese: 的确不能，我想美国科学院院士给你满意答复的。

sentences.english: The Soviet Academician Serguei Tikhvinski has many works on China to his credit.
sentences.chinese: 苏联科学院院士齐赫文中国研究的著作等身。

sentences.english: DaLin Zhang, Nanjing University of Information Science & Technology, China.
The meeting was presided over Chen Junyong Academy of Sciences.
sentences.chinese: 会议由陈俊勇院士主持。

sentences.english: Around the same time, Dr Xiao applied to be elected to the Chinese Academy of Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，肖博士递交申请入选为中国工程院院士。

sentences.english: He was proud of being an academician of this academy.
sentences.chinese: 成为这家学院的院士他很骄傲。

sentences.english: He especially thanked the Chinese Academy of Sciences for allowing him to become an academician.
sentences.chinese: 他特别感谢中科院让他成为院士。

sentences.english: Story of Palaeobotany Series (Supplemental issue): How is the palaeobotany Fellow or Foreign Member of the Royal Society in London selected?
sentences.chinese: 英国皇家学会古植物学院士与外籍院士是如何遴选的？

sentences.english: Story of Palaeobotany Series (Supplemental issue): How is the palaeobotany Fellow or Foreign Member of the Royal Society in London selected?
sentences.chinese: 英国皇家学会古植物学院士与外籍院士是如何遴选的？

sentences.english: Jun Liu, Professor of Harvard University, US.
sentences.chinese: 陈洪渊，中国科学院院士，南京大学教授。

sentences.english: I was in the recently held conference academicians praise you.
sentences.chinese: 我还在最近召开的两院院士大会上表扬了你。

sentences.english: Academician Chen Junyu is a famous landscape educator and flower expert of China.
sentences.chinese: 陈俊愉院士是我国著名的园林教育家和花卉专家。

definition: abbr. for 中國社會科學院|中国社会科学院[Zhong1 guo2 She4 hui4 Ke1 xue2 yuan4], Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS)
(China's achievements of) producing an atomic bomb (1964) and hydrogen bomb (1967) and launching a satellite into space (1970)
Qian Xuesen (1911-2009), Chinese scientist and aeronautical engineer
Tsung-Dao Lee (1926-), Chinese American physicist, Columbia University, 1957 Nobel laureate
State Key Laboratories (university laboratories in PRC supported by the central government)
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Zhong4 dian3 Shi2 yan4 shi4
